name: Omniinfer
description:
## Omniinfer API: Fast Image Generation for 10,000+ Models  - Get Started For Free!

💡 **Features:** Text-to-Image / Image-to-Image / ControlNet / LoRA / Inpainting, supporting over 10,000+ models (including Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x, SDXL 1.0, following civitai models, sfw / nsfw, 18+ / no 18+, hentai / no hentai, dreamlike, 3D, realistic, anime, realism, comic, fantasy, quality porn, art ).

🚀 To obtain a higher call limit and unlock additional features, please visit the site: [https://omnii...

api_methods.name: Text to Image
api_methods.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.

utterances.utterance: Can you create an image from this text description?
I need a picture generated based on the following text.
Please transform this text into an image for me.
Generate an image using this text as a reference.
Could you convert this text into a visual representation?
I want to see an image created from this text.
Turn this text into an image, please.
Make an image from this text description.
Can you visualize this text as an image?
I would like an image generated from this text.

api_methods.name: Progress
api_methods.description:
This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet. 
Note if you get "status":0 in the response, please try this endpoint later untill the status become to 2

utterances.utterance: Can you check the progress of the image generation task with ID 'SunsetBeachArt'?
What's the current status of my task 'AnimePortrait123'?
Please update me on the progress of the image creation task 'FantasyWorld456'.
How is the task 'RealisticLandscape789' coming along?
I need to know the status of the task with ID 'ComicStyleArt101'.
Could you tell me the progress of '3DModelCreation202'?
Check the status of my image task 'ArtisticExpression303'.
Is the task 'HentaiArt404' completed yet?
Let me know how far along the task 'DreamlikeScene505' is.
Can you provide an update on the task 'QualityArt606'?

api_methods.name: Image to  Image
api_methods.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: Can you transform this picture into a new image using your models?
I'd like to modify an image with your image-to-image feature.
Please generate a new version of this image using your advanced models.
Can you apply your image-to-image transformation to this photo?
I'd love to see how your models can alter this image.
Could you use your image-to-image capability to create a new image from this one?
Transform this image using your extensive model library.
Can you generate a different version of this image with your tools?
I'd like to see how your image-to-image feature can change this picture.
Please use your models to create a new image from this existing one.

api_methods.name: Get Models
api_methods.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the available models for text-to-image generation?
I want to see the models that support ControlNet.
List the models for generating images from text.
What models can I use for text-to-image conversion?
Show me the models available for image generation.
Could you provide the models that support text-to-image features?
I need a list of models for creating images from text.
What are the models available for text-to-image processing?
Can you list the models that are used for text-to-image tasks?
Please show me the models for text-to-image generation with the checkpoint type.
